coding_practice.title: Reverse String
coding_practice.description:
Write a function that reverses a string. The input string is given as an array of characters s.

You must do this by modifying the input array in-place with O(1) extra memory.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 10^5
s[i] is a printable ascii character.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 初始化左右指針 left 和 right 分別指向字符串首尾。
2. 當 left < right 時，交換 s[left] 與 s[right]。
3. left 向右移動，right 向左移動，直到兩指針相遇。
4. 原地完成字符串反轉。
